body.name: AZDOME Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear, 3 inch 2.5D IPS Screen Free 64GB Card Car Driving Recorder, 1080P FHD Dashboard Camera, Waterproof Backup Camera Night Vision, Park Monitor, G-Sensor, for Car Taxi
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 43 mins
features: 1080P FHD Dual Dash Cam: 1. Front: 1080P; 2. Front and Rear: 1080P+720P.
ADAS: M01 Pro ADAS function is equipped with lane departure warning system and forward collision warning. Timely ADAS warning could reduce the risk of driving accidents.
Fatigue Driving Reminder: AZDOME M01 Pro dual dash cam provides fatigue driving reminder. Regular reminders could reduce risk of excessive driving time.
Please Format at 1st Time Using: M01 Pro car camera offer user free 64GB SD card. Please format SD card at first time.
Super Night Vision: WDR dashcam delivers super night vision. Dual dash cam could clearly capture all the road details in dim light.
Loop Recording: Loop recording automatically overwrites oldest video with newest video. G-sensor locked videos will not be overwritten.

24H Parking Mode: AZDOME M01 Pro car camera provides 2 parking modes: 1. Collision detection parking mode, G-sensor could detect collision and lock the video; 2. Time-lapse parking mode, car dash cam front and rear could record continuously for 24 hours.
Easy to Install: Car camera comes with 2 installation methods: suction cup bracket and 3M adhesive mount. Driving recorder installation could be done in 5-8 minutes.

Warranty: AZDOME M01 Pro car dash cam provides 12 months warranty and 24*7 technical supports. Please email us when you facing to any problems with aftersales service. AZDOME R&D team will try our best to feedback within 24 hours working days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We had a guy who cut us off and then brake checks us on the way to work and unfortunately we kept crossing paths and he kept doing this. My husband said I wish we had a dash cam that would be enough for the police so he doesn’t hurt someone. We put the sd micro in plugged it in the usb receptacle, mounted on windshield and drove to work didn’t see the guy for weeks. Saw him the other day and caught him cutting off someone and brake checking them. Police said they are going to be watching for him. Hopefully they get him. They said had there been a collision he would have been charged. The picture while dark was clear enough to get make model and license plate. Definitely worth the investment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Night vision actually works
reviews.reviewText: I came from a different dash cam from Shrinluck, and omgosh... "2.5k". That motherfracker was blurry, and night vision was gosh awful. This one... night vision actually works. I can't see the license plates on cars though. It isn't that clear, but way better than what I had before, but it doesn't matter too much. My desire when getting this thing was to capture road plays that I did or that I saw others doing. Capturing evidence from an accident is just a side benefit.I also liked the user interface better on this one. It shows the videos in groups of six with actual thumbnails, so you can get a pretty good idea of which area you're at quickly. The camera stays on there tight and is rather easy to adjust if you need to do so. It doesn't come with an sd reader, but I had already bought one for the other dash cam in case I'd need it, so it wasn't an issue.Setting up was a breeze, but I did need to buy a separate rear view dash cam to support that area of the car. I haven't really plugged it in correctly as I still just have the red wire dangling, but it's mostly just an additional capture of footage. As I said before, I didn't get this for insurance reasons. Just wanted to view my fast and furious moments and share them with others, and now, day or night, I can capture them with this. Decent product, but it ain't crystal clear. You want that? Fork up more money. This one is good for its price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent cam for the price
reviews.reviewText: Have had this in a daily driver for over a year and a half; and for the price, I am satisfied with it.Pros:1. Price, price and price. My first dashcam, I wanted to try one, to see how I liked having it, without spending a lot.2. Smaller size on windshield.3. Good color and picture; but only 1080p. Newer cams offer better, but for more money.4. Decent recordings from front cam.Not as good:5. Rear cam resolution is not adequate to read license plates, or see details; similar to a VHS tape.6. Mirror image from rear cam. Haven't found a menu setting to reverse it.7. Marginally short cord for rear cam. Installed in a conventional cab pickup; and barely reached top of left side of rear window; inside cab. Would never reach the rear bumper area of the vehicle.8. Battery life for parking protection is short, especially in cold weather. Good for an hour or two, and then it's dead; wouldn't record an incident beyond that. Less time in cold temperatures.9. Some reviews mention the additional red wire to the rear cam. This wire is usually connected to the backup light circuit. The rear cam I received did not have this wire. Are there different cam models? Different rear cams?* Overall, an OK product so far, especially for a budget price. Am considering another one for an older vehicle we don't drive very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is really works
reviews.reviewText: Very easy for install and picture visible. I was thinking will be so low quality but NO… it awesome))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this dash cam for my car , it’s been about 3 months since purchase and still works great , very clear video , you can definitely read license plates with this one , the controls can be a little more user friendly, sometimes it’s confusing to close out of something on the camera to get to the main menu but so far , this dash cam is legit and works greatUpdate - August 16, 2023 - stopped working , stopped charging, and just shuts off in the middle of me driving, I tried emailing AZDOME to see if maybe they can help me figure out what’s going on and yet to get a reply back , I would stay away , it worked well when it worked, but I won’t support a company that won’t email there customers back when they need help with there product. I’ve been looking for a new dash cam and there are far better choices , Don’t be like me and a year down the line your looking for a new dash cam because these just stop working out of nowhere ……peaaaaaace lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it ! Is a piece of junk
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The camera doesn’t seem cheap or feel cheap but it just won’t work from day one I started having problems, the camera won’t stay on it will come on and off randomly. On day one I set it up with the settings I wanted it to be while my car is parked, G sensor and parking mode, anyways if you set this 2 settings on, the camera will start turning on and off while driving so I had to manually disable those two important settings in order to stop the camera from turning on and off, after doing that the camera started to work normal but what’s the point if those 2 settings you have to manually turn "on” and "off” every time you park the car. So I did all the troubleshooting and the camera started working until I did turn on again the G sensor and Parking mode, the camera started acting on me again and now the camera won’t even turn on, you can see the blue light on but the screen is black, the camera has been plugged all the time so is not like the battery is low… so I’m deciding to write this review for those who are looking to get this dash cam but I don’t recommend this specific camera maybe the expensive ones work better. What a waste of money and time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes the cameras will randomly turn off and back on again and the only way to stop it is to press the power button and turn the screen off. Also, one of the suction cups won’t stay on my window and keeps falling off. I bought it for the feature of when it senses an impact, it will lock that recording and when it reaches the end of the memory card, it will skip over the recording so it is preserved and you still have the video of what caused the impact.

reviews.reviewTitle: high quality stuff, cam doesn't feel flimsy
reviews.reviewText: will recommend. In fact already recommended to a friend and he bought the exact same model.
Everything was perfect and easy to install
not connecting to the app, so frustrating
It's not connecting to the app so it's useless
It hasn’t even been six months and it just stopped working. I would not recommend this product at all! This is the second one that I’ve had and they all do not last over six months.
